data.message: Those do look great, how many miles before yours broke?  I've got about 400 miles on these and they're still going strong.  I made 'em myself with a sheet of 4mm rubber but followed some of this guys' videos for tips.

Ok, I just pulled mine out because of this conversation and I'm an idiot. It was just the toe knot that frayed and pulled out. Tied a new knot and I'm as good as new. Going for a run on base now. Odds I get stopped by security forces for being a terrorist?
